Public Member Functions

DdMd::DihedralPotential Class Reference

Detailed Description

An DihedralPotential calculates dihedral forces and energies for a parent Simulation.

All operations in this class are local (no MPI).

Definition at line 29 of file ddMd/potentials/dihedral/DihedralPotential.h.

#include <DihedralPotential.h>

virtual double DdMd::DihedralPotential::energy ( ) [pure virtual]

Call only on master processor, result otherwise invalid.
